entry: I am starving, I fear to die very soon and my light will go out forever. @help !sad
help: Would you help me out, kind stranger?
Oh you son of a ...! No, sorry, I get it. Well, maybe another time. !neutral
Just be aware this whole game is pretty pointless if you don't help me out... @help !end
impressed: Well yes, I'm impressed too. Took me some time to get used to it. @help !amused
how: I really need some wood. Surely a strong and marvelous man like you can help an old fire out.
>What do we say to the god of Fire?
But if you don't help me out, there may not be a tomorrow @why
notaman: Neither am I, we have so much in common! So will you help me? With the wood? !amused
Sorry, I mean, you should really help me because otherwise your existence here would be boring !amused
why: Because I am the essence of life. If I die, everything dies. Do you want everything to die?
>Oh, I wouldn't want to be responsible for that! @details
Technically yes. Practically deciding against it would be a little stupid though.
existence: Because your sole existence in this world hinges on helping to keep me alive.
That's why you're here. There's nothing else to do for you anyway.
>I'd rather think about this in private @bye
bye: Sure, take your time. You'll come back eventually! @help !end
details: Great! I knew I could rely on you. I know a good person when I see one!
It's easy! I just need a little firewood so I can keep burning for some longer.
Yes yes! But it needs to be special kind of wood.
There's a good tree in the East. His wood is good. !treezoom
reminder: Go to East. Ask tree for wood. Bring me wood. Soon!
